\newcommand{\ottusedrule}[1]{\[#1\]}
\newcommand{\ottpremise}[1]{ #1 \\}
\newenvironment{ottdefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]}{}
\newenvironment{ottfundefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]\begin{displaymath}\begin{array}{l}}{\end{array}\end{displaymath}}
\newcommand{\ottfunclause}[2]{ #1 \equiv #2 \\}
\newcommand{\ottnt}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottmv}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottkw}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottsym}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\ottcom}[1]{\text{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulename}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottcomplu}[5]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2\in #3 #4 #5}}
\newcommand{\ottcompu}[3]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2<#3}}
\newcommand{\ottcomp}[2]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2}}
\newcommand{\ottgrammartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{llcllllll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottmetavartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{ll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}
\newcommand{\ottprodline}[6]{& & $#1$ & $#2$ & $#3 #4$ & $#5$ & $#6$}
\newcommand{\ottfirstprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}

\newcommand{\ottfirstlongprodline}[2]{\ottlongprodline{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand{\ottbindspecprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}

\newcommand{\ottinterrule}{\\[5.0mm]}
\newcommand{\ottafterlastrule}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{
 $ \ottmv{i} ,\, \ottmv{j} ,\, \ottmv{n} $ & \ottcom{index variables (subscripts)} \\
 $ \ottmv{N} $ & \ottcom{uninterpreted type name} \\
 $ \ottmv{D} $ & \ottcom{data type name} \\
 $ \ottmv{Co} $ & \ottcom{data type constructor name} \\
 $ \ottmv{fn} $ & \ottcom{function name} \\
 $ \ottmv{x} ,\, \ottmv{y} $ & \ottcom{variable} \\
}}

\newcommand{\ottT}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{T}}{::=}{\ottcom{ground type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{D}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{D}  \langle  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{T_{\ottmv{n}}}  \rangle}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottB}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{B}}{::=}{\ottcom{basic type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\mathsf{Bool}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{Int}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottA}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{A}}{::=}{\ottcom{type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{N}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{T}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{D}  \langle  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}}  \rangle}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A} \, \sigma} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottCons}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{Cons}}{::=}{\ottcom{constructor}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{Co}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{Co}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottDd}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{Dd}}{::=}{\ottcom{datatype definition}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{data} \, \ottmv{D}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{Cons_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}} \, ... \, \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}}  \ottnt{Cons_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{;}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{data} \, \ottmv{D}  \langle  \ottmv{N_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{N_{\ottmv{i}}}  \rangle  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{Cons_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}} \, ... \, \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}}  \ottnt{Cons_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{;}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottF}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{F}}{::=}{\ottcom{function definition}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{def} \, \ottnt{A} \, \ottmv{fn}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}} \, \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{;}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{def} \, \ottnt{A} \, \ottmv{fn}  \langle  \ottmv{N_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{N_{\ottmv{i}}}  \rangle  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{j}}} \, \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{;}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottb}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{b}}{::=}{\ottcom{boolean}}}

\newcommand{\otte}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{e}}{::=}{\ottcom{expression}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{b}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{boolean expression}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{variable}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{ground term}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{Co}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{constructor}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{Co}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{constructor with parameters}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{fn}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{function call}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{e} \, \sigma} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottt}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{t}}{::=}{\ottcom{term}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{Co}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{Co}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{null}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottsig}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{sig}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottctxv}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{ctxv}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{sig}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottG}{
\ottrulehead{\Gamma}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\Gamma  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{n}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottnsubst}{
\ottrulehead{\sigma}{::=}{}}

\newcommand{\ottxsubst}{
\ottrulehead{\sigma}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mapsto  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{n}}}  \mapsto  \ottmv{y_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\otttsubst}{
\ottrulehead{\sigma}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\sigma  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y_{\ottmv{n}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{t_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottterminals}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{terminals}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \Rightarrow }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \{ }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Bool} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Int} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \langle }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \rangle }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathrm{True} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathrm{False} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \leadsto }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \vdash }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mapsto }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \rightarrow }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathrm{tmatch} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathrm{fresh} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathrm{vars} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \subseteq }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottformula}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{formula}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{judgement}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{judgment}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{formula_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \quad ... \quad \ottnt{formula_{\ottmv{n}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{conjunction of formulas}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{A}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{Co}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{sig}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{fn}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{sig}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\sigma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{t}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathrm{tmatch} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathrm{fresh} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{wt} \, \ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottfunctionalXXwellXXformedness}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{functional\_well\_formedness}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{well-formed expression}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{Cons}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{well-formed cons}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{Dd}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{well-formed data definition}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{F}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{well-formed function declaration}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \vdash  \sigma}{}{}{}{\ottcom{well-formed term substitution}}}

\newcommand{\ottfunctionalXXevaluation}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{functional\_evaluation}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{F_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{F_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \vdash  \ottnt{e}  \leadsto  \sigma'  \vdash  \ottnt{e'}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{expression evaluation}}}

\newcommand{\ottjudgement}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{judgement}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{functional\_well\_formedness}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{functional\_evaluation}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottuserXXsyntax}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{user\_syntax}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{i}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{N}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{D}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{Co}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{fn}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{T}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{Cons}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{Dd}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{F}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{b}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{e}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{sig}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{ctxv}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\sigma}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\sigma}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\sigma}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{terminals}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{formula}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottgrammar}{\ottgrammartabular{
\ottT\ottinterrule
\ottB\ottinterrule
\ottA\ottinterrule
\ottCons\ottinterrule
\ottDd\ottinterrule
\ottF\ottinterrule
\ottb\ottinterrule
\otte\ottinterrule
\ottt\ottinterrule
\ottsig\ottinterrule
\ottctxv\ottinterrule
\ottG\ottinterrule
\ottnsubst\ottinterrule
\ottxsubst\ottinterrule
\otttsubst\ottinterrule
\ottterminals\ottinterrule
\ottformula\ottinterrule
\ottfunctionalXXwellXXformedness\ottinterrule
\ottfunctionalXXevaluation\ottinterrule
\ottjudgement\ottinterrule
\ottuserXXsyntax\ottafterlastrule
}}

%% defn e
\newcommand{\ottdruletXXbool}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{b}  \ottsym{:}  \mathsf{Bool}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_bool}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXnull}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottkw{null}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_null}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXfuncXXexpr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\mathrm{tmatch} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A'_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \quad ... \quad \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A'_{\ottmv{j}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{fn}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{i}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{fn}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} \, \sigma}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_func\_expr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXconsXXexpr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\mathrm{tmatch} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A'_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \quad ... \quad \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A'_{\ottmv{j}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{Co}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{i}}}  \rightarrow  \ottmv{D}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{Co}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}  \ottmv{D}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_cons\_expr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXconsXXexprXXparam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\mathrm{tmatch} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A'_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \quad ... \quad \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A'_{\ottmv{j}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{Co}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{i}}}  \rightarrow  \ottmv{D}  \langle  \ottmv{N_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{N_{\ottmv{n}}}  \rangle}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{Co}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}  \ottmv{D}  \langle  \ottmv{N_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{N_{\ottmv{n}}}  \rangle \, \sigma}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_cons\_expr\_param}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntXXe}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}$}{\ottcom{well-formed expression}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXbool{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXnull{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXfuncXXexpr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXconsXXexpr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXconsXXexprXXparam{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn cons
\newcommand{\ottdruletXXconsXXdecl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{Co}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}}  \rightarrow  \ottmv{D}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{Co}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}  \ottmv{D}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_cons\_decl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXconsXXdeclXXparam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{Co}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{i}}}  \rightarrow  \ottmv{D}  \langle  \ottmv{N_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{N_{\ottmv{j}}}  \rangle}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{Co}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}  \ottmv{D}  \langle  \ottmv{N_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{N_{\ottmv{j}}}  \rangle}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_cons\_decl\_param}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntXXcons}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{Cons}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}$}{\ottcom{well-formed cons}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXconsXXdecl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXconsXXdeclXXparam{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn dd
\newcommand{\ottdruletXXdataXXdecl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{Cons_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottmv{D} \quad ... \quad \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{Cons_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottmv{D}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottkw{data} \, \ottmv{D}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{Cons_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}} \, ... \, \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}}  \ottnt{Cons_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{;}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_data\_decl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXdataXXdeclXXparam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{Cons_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottmv{D}  \langle  \ottmv{N_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{N_{\ottmv{i}}}  \rangle \quad ... \quad \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{Cons_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottmv{D}  \langle  \ottmv{N_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{N_{\ottmv{i}}}  \rangle}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottkw{data} \, \ottmv{D}  \langle  \ottmv{N_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{N_{\ottmv{i}}}  \rangle  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{Cons_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}} \, ... \, \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}}  \ottnt{Cons_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{;}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_data\_decl\_param}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntXXdd}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{Dd}$}{\ottcom{well-formed data definition}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXdataXXdecl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXdataXXdeclXXparam{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn F
\newcommand{\ottdruletXXfuncXXdecl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{fn}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{n}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  \vdash  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottkw{def} \, \ottnt{A} \, \ottmv{fn}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}} \, \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{;}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_func\_decl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXfuncXXdeclXXparam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{fn}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{n}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  \vdash  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottkw{def} \, \ottnt{A} \, \ottmv{fn}  \langle  \ottmv{N_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{N_{\ottmv{i}}}  \rangle  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}} \, \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{;}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_func\_decl\_param}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntXXF}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{F}$}{\ottcom{well-formed function declaration}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXfuncXXdecl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXfuncXXdeclXXparam{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn tsubst
\newcommand{\ottdruletXXtsubstXXwt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{wt} \, \ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \sigma}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_tsubst\_wt}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntXXtsubst}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \sigma$}{\ottcom{well-formed term substitution}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXtsubstXXwt{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsfunctionalXXwellXXformedness}{
\ottdefntXXe{}\ottdefntXXcons{}\ottdefntXXdd{}\ottdefntXXF{}\ottdefntXXtsubst{}}

% defns functional_evaluation
%% defn tsubst_e
\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\sigma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{t}}%
}{
\ottnt{F_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{F_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \leadsto  \sigma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXcons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{F_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{F_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \vdash  \ottnt{e}  \leadsto  \sigma'  \vdash  \ottnt{e'}}%
}{
\ottnt{F_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{F_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \vdash  \ottmv{Co}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{)}  \leadsto  \sigma'  \vdash  \ottmv{Co}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_cons}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXfunXXexp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{F_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{F_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \vdash  \ottnt{e}  \leadsto  \sigma'  \vdash  \ottnt{e'}}%
}{
\ottnt{F_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{F_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \vdash  \ottmv{fn}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{)}  \leadsto  \sigma'  \vdash  \ottmv{fn}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_fun\_exp}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXfunXXground}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\mathrm{fresh} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
\ottnt{F_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{F_{\ottmv{i}}} \, \ottkw{def} \, \ottnt{A} \, \ottmv{fn}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}} \, \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{;} \, \ottnt{F'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{F'_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \vdash  \ottmv{fn}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \leadsto  \sigma  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y_{\ottmv{n}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{t_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  \vdash  \ottnt{e} \, \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mapsto  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{n}}}  \mapsto  \ottmv{y_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_fun\_ground}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXfunXXgroundXXparam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\mathrm{fresh} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
\ottnt{F_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{F_{\ottmv{i}}} \, \ottkw{def} \, \ottnt{A} \, \ottmv{fn}  \langle  \ottmv{N_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{N_{\ottmv{i}}}  \rangle  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{\ottmv{n}}} \, \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{;} \, \ottnt{F'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{F'_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \vdash  \ottmv{fn}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \leadsto  \sigma  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y_{\ottmv{n}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{t_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  \vdash  \ottnt{e} \, \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mapsto  \ottmv{y_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{n}}}  \mapsto  \ottmv{y_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_fun\_ground\_param}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnredXXtsubstXXe}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{F_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{F_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \vdash  \ottnt{e}  \leadsto  \sigma'  \vdash  \ottnt{e'}$}{\ottcom{expression evaluation}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXcons{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXfunXXexp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXfunXXground{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXfunXXgroundXXparam{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsfunctionalXXevaluation}{
\ottdefnredXXtsubstXXe{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsfunctionalXXwellXXformedness
\ottdefnsfunctionalXXevaluation
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
